# Gen87.X3 Sandbox - W3C Gesture Control Plane
# Quick context for LLMs - READ THIS FIRST

## STATUS: HUNT PHASE ACTIVE (H)
- Finding exemplars, exploring options
- NOT deciding on final architecture yet
- Blackboard: sandbox/obsidianblackboard.jsonl

## USER VISION
MediaPipe -> Physics (1E) -> FSM (XState) -> W3C Pointer -> TargetAdapter -> ANY TARGET

## TARGET ADAPTERS DISCOVERED
- DOM: dispatchEvent()
- Excalidraw: onPointerDown/Up callbacks
- tldraw: DOM renderer
- v86: keyboard_send_scancodes()
- js-dos: setMouseSensitivity()
- EmulatorJS: EJS_defaultControls
- daedalOS: Full web OS (12.2K stars)
- Puter: Cloud OS (38K stars)
- WinBox.js: 4KB window manager

## KEY DOCS
- sandbox/specs/W3C_GESTURE_CONTROL_PLANE_SPEC.md
- Memory Bank: Gen83 Gold Baton

## The Mantra
The spider weaves the web that weaves the spider.
